headline.main: Pakistan Opens Border Crossing With Afghanistan Amid Rising Tensions
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Opens Border Crossing With Afghanistan Amid Rising Tensions

lead_paragraph: Pakistan said on Monday it would open border crossings for two days to allow through Afghans with valid visas after Islamabad shut the frontier because it said militants accused of a series of attacks were being sheltered in the neighboring country.
